Package battle

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Actor
    A participant in a battle that can have turns and perform actions when those turns are due.
    FighterHandler  
    SkillHandler
    Objects implementing this interface can become listeners to various Skill object events and state changes.
    StatusHandler
    Objects implementing this interface can become listeners to various Status object events and state changes.
    TurnItem
    A point in time within a turn order can be called in order to perform an action.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Battlefield  
    Fighter
    Participates in battles as a member of a squad.
    FighterBuilder  
    Skill
    Instructions that, when executed by its owner, applies Status objects to valid target(s).
    SkillBuilder
    Constructs Skill objects using a builder pattern.
    Squad  
    Status
    A state that can be applied to Fighter objects through the execution of Skill objects.
    StatusBuilder
    Constructs Status objects using a builder pattern.
    Target
    Used to store the logic to generate a list of Fighter object that can be legal targets for a skill.
    TurnOrder
    Tracks time within a battle and advances items that produce events as time continues forward.
